fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: All EU initiatives, policies and legislative files related transport, energy, agro-food and building materials.
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: ALONSO#Emiliano, GARRIDO VAQUERO#Javier, González Domínguez#Carolina, MONRABÀ BAGAN#Josep
goals__remit: International Consultancy specialised in lobbying, EU law, European and UN affairs. With 30 years of presence in Brussels, the company advises/represents the interests of large companies and associations from Europe, Brazil, China, Russia, Canada, India operating in different sectors: agri-food, energy, transport and building materials. The company concentrates its activity in the EU institutions and UN Organizations based in Geneva.
